abstract: Ultimate Fighting Championship announces plans for November mixed martial arts show at New York City's Madison Square Garden, after Gov Andrew Cuomo signs law making New York last state to lift ban on sport.
lead_paragraph: New York State ended its ban on professional mixed martial arts — it was the last holdout in the nation — opening the cages for major fights in its big venues across the state.

headline.main: New York Ends Ban on Mixed Martial Arts and Gets a Show
headline.print_headline: New York Ends Ban and Gets a Show

snippet: New York State ended its ban on professional mixed martial arts — it was the last holdout in the nation — opening the cages for major fights in its big venues across the state.
